title: Buying pets in Russia, Belarus unsafe, says Latvian authority
desc: The Food and Veterinary Service (PVD) is urging Latvian residents not to purchase dogs, cats, and domestic ferrets in Russia and Belarus, as it is not safe, the service said on 17th February.
